text: The lifestyle of nomadic people. From the Eurasian Romani, Middle Easter Bedouin, North American Snowbirds, to the animal herding people all over the world. Some people have little desire to reside in one place for long. Whether it is a phase of life or a life long journey, the lifestyle can lead to a greater understanding of other cultures as well as the world around us. Oddly it seems to be not as well received as nudism in most of Europe.
title: Ziganism
